Test Cases: Manager can edit customer account if the account is associated to the manger
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid "Account No" associated with the manager
Test Data: Accounts No. associated to the manager
Expected Result: The manager successfully edit customer account

Test Cases: Manager can't edit customer account not associated to him
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid "Account No" not associated with the manager
Expected Result: An error message "Account does not exist" must shown
